text: Trendelenburg could refer to: *Friedrich Adolf Trendelenburg (1802-1872), German philosopher and philologist *His son, Friedrich Trendelenburg (1844-1924), German surgeon *Trendelenburg gait *Trendelenburg position *Trendelenburg test *Trendelenburg's sign *Trendelenburg's operation - great saphenous vein ligation as a treatment of varicose veins.
title: Trendelenburg
